articles.title: Global markets down as inflation spikes in Europe and oil rises again - ABC News
articles.description: Instability and inflation are continuing to weigh on global markets, with the ASX 200 headed for its first trading day down in a week.
articles.content:

articles.title: Germany says to still pay for Russian gas in euros/dollars after Scholz-Putin call - Reuters.com
articles.description: Germany will continue to pay for Russian gas in euros or dollars, a government spokesman said, adding that Russian President Vladimir Putin had told the German chancellor nothing would change for European partners despite his plan for rouble payments.
articles.content: BERLIN, March 30 (Reuters) - Germany will continue to pay for Russian gas in euros or dollars, a government spokesman said, adding that Russian President Vladimir Putin had told the German chancellor… [+2105 chars]
